**Correct Answer**: A) ğŸ”§ `Integrating security practices into DevOps workflows`

D) ğŸ¯ `Database breach`

> ğŸ’¡ Supply chain attacks target the software supply chain. Like poisoning ingredients instead of attacking the final dish!
